directions: Combine almond milk, chia seeds, blueberries, maple syrup, vanilla extract, and cinnamon in a blender; blend until smooth. Pour into 3 ramekins or glasses. Chill until set, 8 hours to overnight. Serve chilled.
ingredients: 6 tablespoons chia seeds, or more to taste
1 tablespoon maple syrup, or more to taste
title: Blueberry Chia Pudding with Almond Milk
